artist: Artist: Sascha Scatter; Publisher: Sascha Scatter , Gardiner, N.Y.
creditline: Fly Zine Archive, The Mary and Robyn Campbell Fund for Art Books and gift of funds from Mary and Bob Mersky
description: Corner stab stitched binding, xerographic reproductions of two photographs (one of a forest, the other of the inside of a subway car) and text printed on wove paper; 28 pp.
title: Underground Roots
